mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def remove_outliers(data, threshold=2.5):
    q1 = np.percentile(data, 25)
    q3 = np.percentile(data, 75)
    iqr = q3 - q1
    lower_bound = q1 - threshold * iqr
    upper_bound = q3 + threshold * iqr
    return data[(data > lower_bound) & (data < upper_bound)]
